comments.comment:
This is the true picture of SriLanka. When you wanted food they changed the name of the country when you wanted education they made Singhelese official language. So that they could keep general public ignorant. That of course they did pretty well. English education was only for the rich and just see all politicians' children where they have their education. I read moron Sirisena's son had a degree in a British university. They fought for independence just to rob the country and as a result of that only 001% of people have a good life and they are politicians and their henchmen.
Of course it would have been a lot better under English.

My question is do you need 70 years to understand it?
You may have one excuse that is there wasn't someone honest to vote for or you never knew how the other countries poorer than Srilanka became prosperous. 
Now there is one man who has come forward to save the country and its citizens. Therefore there are no excuses anymore. The unique solution to the problem is one and only NAGANANDA.
comments.author: Lionel MO
